name: Christopher Nolan
bio: Known for non-linear storytelling and visually striking films. Directed Inception, Interstellar, and The Dark Knight trilogy.

name: Quentin Tarantino
bio: Famous for stylized violence, witty dialogue, and nonlinear plots. Directed Pulp Fiction, Kill Bill, and Django Unchained.

name: Wes Anderson
bio: Recognized for his unique visual style, symmetrical framing, and quirky storytelling. Directed The Grand Budapest Hotel and Moonrise Kingdom.
